description.p: An Address specifies a physical or virtual location which where physical, postal or virtual contact can be made.

explicit.name: street_number
explicit.description: the number of a building in a street.

explicit.name: postal_box
explicit.description: the number of a postal box.

explicit.name: region
explicit.description: the name of an area composed of towns.

explicit.name: postal_code
explicit.description: the code that is used by the country's postal service.

explicit.name: internal_location
explicit.description: an organization-defined address for internal mail delivery.

explicit.name: facsimile_number
explicit.description: the number at which facsimiles may be received.

explicit.name: telephone_number
explicit.description: the number at which telephone calls may be received.

explicit.name: electronic_mail_address
explicit.description: the electronic address at which electronic mail may be received.

explicit.name: telex_number
explicit.description: the number at which telex messages may be received.

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (EXISTS (street_number) OR EXISTS (street) OR EXISTS (postal_box) OR EXISTS (town) OR EXISTS (region) OR EXISTS (postal_code) OR EXISTS (country) OR EXISTS (internal_location) OR EXISTS (facsimile_number) OR EXISTS (telephone_number) OR EXISTS (electronic_mail_address) OR EXISTS (telex_number))
where.description: At least one of the attributes shall have a value.

description.p: An Organization is a group of people involved in a particular process or that share a common interest.
description.note: The mechanism for guaranteeing the uniqueness of organization id is outside the scope of ISO 10303.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the unique identification of the organization

explicit.name: short_name
explicit.description: a short, abbreviated name of the organization

explicit.name: long_name
explicit.description: the full formal name of the organization

explicit.name: address
explicit.description: the optional address of the organization which may be used to indicate an item delivery address, a postal address, or a physical location visitor address.

description.p: A Person_in_organization is the identification of an individual human being in an organization.
description.note: The mechanism for guaranteeing the uniqueness of person id is outside the scope of ISO 10303.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the unique identifier of the person
